entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain overnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
